titleStmt.title: A booke called the treasure for traueilers deuided into fiue bookes or partes, contayning very necessary matters, for all sortes of trauailers, eyther by sea or by lande, written by William Bourne.
titleStmt.author: Bourne, William, d. 1583.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Thomas Dawson] for Thomas Woodcocke, dwelling in Paules Churchyarde, at the sygne of the blacke Beare,

notesStmt.note: Each book has separate pagination and register re-commencing 2A, 3A etc.
With a final errata and colophon leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
